title: Google SheetsSUM Function

metadata.description: Learn about Google SheetsSUM Function with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title:
Google Sheets
SUM Function

SUM Function
The
SUM
function is a premade function in Google Sheets
content_sections.content: , which adds up numbers in a range.

content_sections.title: It is typed
content_sections.content:
=SUM
and gets a list of cells:
=SUM(
value1
,
[value2, ...]
)
You can
select cells one by one, but also ranges, or even multiple ranges.
Note:

content_sections.title: The
content_sections.content:
=SUM
function adds up both negative and positive cell values.
Let's see some examples!
Sum Function Example
Calculate the sum of all the Total stats for this list of Pokemon:
Name	Total stats
    Mankey	305
    Magneton	465
    Onix	385
    Dragonair	420
    Pidgeotto	349
    Rattata	253
    Charmeleon	405
    Gastly	310
    Magikarp	200
      
    SUM
Copy Values
The
SUM
function, step by step:
Select the cell
B12

content_sections.title: Type
content_sections.content:
=SUM
Click the
SUM
command
Specify the range
B2:B10
for the Total stats
Hit enter
Now, the function calculates the sum of Total stats for the Pokemon in the list:
Great job!

content_sections.title: You have successfully calculated the sum of the stats using the
content_sections.content:
=SUM
function. The Pokemon's stats have a total sum of
3092
.
Let's change one of the values in the range, to see what happens. Type
350
into cell
B7
:
Rattata
total stats was changed from
253
to
350
.
The
SUM
function updated the total sum from
3092
to
3189
.
It updates the
SUM
when values inside of the range are changed.
Lets change
Rattata's
stats to a negative number to see what happens. Type
-350
into cell
B7
:
The
SUM
is updated to
2489
. Adding a negative number subtracts that value from the range.

★
+1

content_sections.title: Example
content_sections.code:
Name	Total stats
    Mankey	305
    Magneton	465
    Onix	385
    Dragonair	420
    Pidgeotto	349
    Rattata	253
    Charmeleon	405
    Gastly	310
    Magikarp	200
      
    SUM

summary: This tutorial covers Google SheetsSUM Function concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use Google SheetsSUM Function effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples. By the end of this tutorial, you'll have a solid understanding of Google SheetsSUM Function and how to apply it in your projects.
